Title: Series: Königlich Baierischer Gemälde-Saal zu München und Schleissheim in Steindruck
Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt; the Virgin sits at centre and suckles Christ Child whilst Joseph looks on, with cherries in his right hand; beyond, at right, a river. Lithograph
Producer name: Print made by: Ferdinand Piloty I
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Fürst Karl von Paar, Freiherr auf Hartberg und Krottenstein (estate of)
Purchased through: A E Evans & Sons
